pages.title: Joints
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Connects physics structures via constraints. Use the Tool Gun (see its chapter).$(br2)Adjust height with a wrench.
$(li)Sphere Hinge: Allows free rotation.$(li)Revolute Hinge: Fixed-axis rotation (unpowered Joint Motor).$(li)Pivot Hinge: Fixed-axis rotation (unpowered Servo Motor).
